title: [K-12] Education Utilizing Automated Programming Grading Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational programming concepts and experience applying digital technologies to solve social issues
context.additional_context: Learners study microlearning content provided weekly via personal mobile devices and apply programming techniques for social problem-solving through project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles and operational methods of automated grading systems and develop effective learning strategies utilizing them
Learners can design and evaluate programming assignments for solving social issues using LLM-based test case generation tools
Learners can analyze error cases occurring in automated grading systems and propose test case enhancement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
